bioconda.name: bioconductor-beadarray
bioconda.summary: Quality assessment and low-level analysis for Illumina BeadArray data

biotools.summary: The package is able to read bead-level data (raw TIFFs and text files) output by BeadScan as well as bead-summary data from BeadStudio.  Methods for quality assessment and low-level analysis are provided.

bioschemas.name: beadarray
bioschemas.summary: The package is able to read bead-level data (raw TIFFs and text files) output by BeadScan as well as bead-summary data from BeadStudio.  Methods for quality assessment and low-level analysis are provided.
